summary: An overworked, underpaid magazine intern goes from the mail-room to the boardroom, while searching for a spy within the company.
cast: Dominique Swain|Ben Pullen|Peggy Lipton|David Deblinger|Joan Rivers|Kathy Griffin|Billy Porter|Anna Thomson|Paulina Porizkova|James Urbaniak|Leilani Bishop|Rocco Sisto|Anson Scoville|Dwight Ewell|Bill Raymond|André Leon Talley|Alexia Landeau|Samia Shoaib|Mary Wigmore|Victor Varnado|Tristine Skyler|Cameron Hiller|Shannon Burkett|John McClune|Will Kopelman|Richard Sinnott|Jill Kargman|Donna Hanover|Nell Campbell|Kidada Jones|Ryan Browning|Tommy Hilfiger|Elizabeth Saltzman|Frederic Fekkai|Alexandra Villa|Lauren Aserski|Cynthia Rowley|Kenneth Cole|John Bartlett|Kevyn Aucoin|Simon Doonan|Phillip Bloch|Diane von Fürstenberg|Janine Barris|Dar Billingham|Tina Casciani|Nancy Ding|Gwyneth Paltrow|Katalin Pota|Eliot Sash
title: La becaria
